title: Get this 25% Discount on the Samsung Galaxy A35!
description: Get the Galaxy A35 for much less! The post Get this 25% Discount on the Samsung Galaxy A35! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Get the Galaxy A35 for much less!
text: The Samsung Galaxy A35 is currently one of the more affordable smartphones in the North American market, and it packs a lot of features which will be useful and familiar for fans of Samsung’s Galaxy smartphone brand. More importantly it’s also on sale at the moment, going for around 25% off via Amazon, making it a bit more affordable thanks to this deal. In terms of what you get with the Galaxy A35, the phone comes with a large 6.6-inch display, up to 128GB of storage (with micro SD card support), 6GB of RAM, and access to all your favourite Android apps and software features. It also comes with an IP67 rating, keeping it safe from light splashes and dusty scenarios. You can check it out using the link below. The Samsung Galaxy A35 is currently one of the more affordable smartphones in the North American market, and it packs a lot of features which will be useful and familiar for fans of Samsung’s Galaxy smartphone brand. More importantly it’s also on sale at the moment, going for around 25% off via Amazon, making it a bit more affordable thanks to this deal.

In terms of what you get with the Galaxy A35, the phone comes with a large 6.6-inch display, up to 128GB of storage (with micro SD card support), 6GB of RAM, and access to all your favourite Android apps and software features. It also comes with an IP67 rating, keeping it safe from light splashes and dusty scenarios. You can check it out using the link below.
